channel.title: A Little Bit Of Help
channel.description:
:)
I was wondering if anyone would be willing to help me create a clan page on my website www.custom-pc-gaming.co.uk Template banner all that is done, the site is great but i need specific help on this clan page
- I need to know how to do some profiles on the page of each clan member.. like maybe a thumbnail picture and then a description...
And stuff like that is anyone willing to help or guide me in the right direction...

item.title: A Little Bit Of Help
item.dc:creator: @Kimber Kimber
item.description:
@Kimber wrote:

Thumbnails… I use a simply code for using gallerys like this, help this helps you:

<img src=“image source” width=“75”, height=“75”>

This basically pits an image on the page which is 75x75 (width=“75”, height=“75”) and once the image is clicked a popup will come up with the image at its full size, 150x125 (width=150, height=125). Only thing I found annoying with this was the “image name” at the start must be in the same directory as the page.

Read full topic
